bibl.title: First Notes on Menander's Samia.
bibl.note: By-product of work devoted to Menander's Samia during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - 1. The Play's Date. - 2. Passages of Text: Vv. 5-6, 10-13, 27-28, 51-53, 55-57, 59, 60, 67-69, 71-75, 77-79, 96, 96-111.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, First Notes on Menander's Samia.

By-product of work devoted to Menander's Samia during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - 1. The Play's Date. - 2. Passages of Text: Vv. 5-6, 10-13, 27-28, 51-53, 55-57, 59, 60, 67-69, 71-75, 77-79, 96, 96-111.
